ygData.subject: RE: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I used to have this problem, especially seeing things in the darker zones Greater Faydark, Kithicor, etc. But after I upgraded my video card you can see
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
>
> Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
> >
> > I should know this - and could probably look it up if I'm not
> > lazy.. But what's the difference between Ultravision and
> > Infravision..
> >
> > Slyde
> >
>
> Nobody explicitly said this, but if I'm not mistaken, Ultravision
> also allows you to see through invisibility. I used to sing
> it to find
> out whether any of my favorite KSing Wizards were hiding in the rooms
> with us in High Keep. I am pretty certain that infravision
> does not see
> invisible, since I believe it is the same as my native Half-Elf
> infravision.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk
>
> PS - Playing my non-infravision characters, the worst vision
> spot I've
> found so far is the zone tunnel between Everfrost and Blackburrow. I
> finally got the turns memorized, but that tunnel is LONG and DARK.

I used to have this problem, especially seeing things in the darker zones
Greater Faydark, Kithicor, etc. But after I upgraded my video card you can
see things a whole lot clearer, including the tunnels.

---Windleaf, 23 level, Bertoxxulous
